tools.name: split_text
tools.description: Split a document into chunks, saving each chunk to individual files and updating the manifest.

source_file_path.description: Absolute path to the source document to split

output_dir.description: Absolute path to the workspace directory (containing manifest.json)

tools.name: count_words
tools.description: Count the number of words in a text string or file.

text.description: The text to count words in (mutually exclusive with file_path)

file_path.description: Path to file to count words in (mutually exclusive with text)

tools.name: split_paragraphs
tools.description: Split text into paragraphs with metadata including word counts and positions.

text.description: The text to split into paragraphs (mutually exclusive with file_path)

file_path.description: Path to file to split into paragraphs (mutually exclusive with text)
